articles.title: Former US ambassador arrested in Florida, accused of serving as an agent of Cuba, AP source says - ABC News
articles.description: The Associated Press has learned that a former American diplomat who served as U.S. ambassador to Bolivia has been arrested in a long-running FBI counterintelligence investigation and is accused of secretly serving as an agent of the Cuban government
articles.content: MIAMI -- A former American diplomat who served as U.S. ambassador to Bolivia has been arrested in a long-running FBI counterintelligence investigation, accused of secretly serving as an agent of Cuba… [+3917 chars]
